list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: at, to, or by a great distance (used to indicate the extent to which one thing is distant from another).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it was not too far away

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: over a large expanse of space or time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã không đi xa

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he is able to function far better than usual
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy có thể hoạt động tốt hơn bình thường

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: situated at a great distance in space or time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the far reaches of the universe
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: khoảng cách xa của vũ trụ
